title: Council Decision of 6 May 1994 appointing a full member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 6 May 1994 appointing a full member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture (94/C 135/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 85/385/EEC of 10 June 1985, setting up an Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 9 November 1992 (2), the Council appointed Mr Jan SOENDERGAARD a full member of the said Committee for the period ending 19 June 1994;
Whereas the Danish Government has nominated Ms Bente BEEDHOLM to replace Mr Jan SOENDERGAARD,
main_body: Ms Bente BEEDHOLM is hereby appointed a full member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture in place of Mr Jan SOENDERGAARD for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 19 June 1994.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 May 1994.
For the Council
The President
Th. PANGALOS
(1) OJ No L 223, 21. 8. 1985, p. 26.
(2) OJ No C 300, 17. 11. 1992, p. 2.
